info.title: Wiki API
info.description: This API is used to perform operations on the wikis of laWiki

/v1/wikis.description: Search for wikis using the below query parameters.

get.description: Get a list of Wikis that match a keyword string. Results can by filtered by tags, sorted by different parameters and support pagination.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: String to be searched within the wiki's name.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Maximum amount of results to be returned.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The index of the first result to return. Use with limit to get the next page of search results.

parameters.name: order
parameters.description: Sorts the articles by different criteria

parameters.name: creation_date
parameters.description: Single date or range

parameters.name: author_name
parameters.description: Filter for the author of the Wiki
